getPayload

public byte[] getPayload()
Description copied from class: WebSocketMessage
Returns the 'original' payload as found in the WebSocket frame. Returned bytes array does not back the messages payload buffer (i.e. it is a copy).

Specified by:
getPayload in class WebSocketMessage
Returns:
bytes of payload
